column2: BRIEF-Affiliated Managers Group Says CEO Sean M. Healey's 2017 Total Compensation Was $13.8 Million April 30 (Reuters) - Affiliated Managers Group Inc: * AFFILIATED MANAGERS GROUP INC SAYS CEO SEAN M. HEALEY’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $13.8 MILLION VERSUS $14.7 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING * AFFILIATED MANAGERS GROUP INC SAYS CFO JAY C. HORGEN'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $6.6 MILLION VERSUS $7 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING Source : bit.ly/2HGbuDt Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
